name: Cryptex - find Words
description:
Find hidden words using letters on Cryptex!
Let's start exciting words puzzle game!

HOW TO PLAY
• Simply swipe your finger over cryptex to suggest a word for given topic.
• If you've found a valid word it will be marked on the words field.
• Find all the words in topic to complete the level.
• More words to find - more stars.
• Unlock and Find hidden words in additional game modes: riddles, templates, synonyms, aphorisms.

FEATURES
• Gameplay based on Cryptex
• Free classic mode
• Special modes: riddles, templates, synonyms, aphorisms
• Daily bonus rewards
• Best exercise for the brain
• Support both Phones and Tablets.
• Free update!
• Family support (filter sensitive ads)!

More levels and game modes coming soon! Stay tuned!

PS. The word cryptex is a neologism. Origin of word: formed from Greek κρυπτός kryptós, “hidden, secret”.
